scripts.sim-iphone-5s: gulp && cordova build ios && ios-sim launch 'platforms/ios/build/emulator/AC Mobile.app' --devicetypeid "com.apple.CoreSimulator.SimDeviceType.iPhone-5s, 8.1"
scripts.sim-iphone-6: gulp && cordova build ios && ios-sim launch 'platforms/ios/build/emulator/AC Mobile.app' --devicetypeid "com.apple.CoreSimulator.SimDeviceType.iPhone-6, 8.1"
scripts.sim-iphone-6p: gulp && cordova build ios && ios-sim launch 'platforms/ios/build/emulator/AC Mobile.app' --devicetypeid "com.apple.CoreSimulator.SimDeviceType.iPhone-6-Plus, 8.1"
